name: First Wedding Cake Chef Salon
description:
First wedding cake chef is the best game in your town where you serve your guest with a variety of wonderful wedding cakes. Cooking cake is not as tougher. Especially for star chef like you. In this game, Groom will food demand for his wedding. Now it's time to prepare a chef for a wedding day. You have to start some interesting chef's dress up activities using various tools like a comb and clothe. After dress up, Chef is ready for making & decorate wedding cake using topping food items like cake liquid, cream and strawberry. Don't forget to make a special note for a bride on a cake. The most important part is groom's car, you need to perform car washing properly. By playing this game, people love cake baking because it's a crazy fun adventure to bake a yummy chocolate cake.

Features:

- Lots of garnishing & topping options
- Collect the food items
- Interactive Girls Chef Cooking
- Special Wedding Occasion
- Perform cleaning and dress up activity
